data.title: Not the best
data.text: I met some friends here for brunch. I love the decor, the staff is courteous, and it is moderately priced ($8 for full-size crepe and $2.50 for coffee). I just thought the food could have been better. I got the Turkey, Swiss & Tomatoes crepe with pesto. It was filling, but there wasn't much cheese or tomatoes, and the turkey was a little bit cold. If I back go again, I will try french toast or maybe a pastry.

data.title: Nice cafe
data.text: This is a very nice cafe with crepes, quiches, sandwiches and pastries.  We had lunch here on arriving in Phoenix and enjoyed.  Staff is friendly as well.

data.title: Delicious crepe
data.text: We order Nutella crepe with marshmallows for the kids and it's very delicious but after a few bites it can get sweet for adult taste. For kids, it's great. My kids love it! I also ordered a chicken crepe. My first time trying non sweet crepe and loved it. Not greasy and has spinach in it. Perfect for breakfast/lunch pair with ice latte with sugar free vanilla. Will come back if I'm around the area.

data.title: A Delightful New Bistro in a Much Needed Location!
data.text:
I was meeting a girlfriend for lunch the other day and she suggested we try The Crepe Club.  It's only been open a few weeks. 

It didn't take much to convince me as I love crepes and I can never get my husband to enjoy them with me so I was very excited to try it out. 

The Crepe Club, located next to Williams Sonoma, did not disappoint.  

The atmosphere is sooo pleasant.  The décor is sort of old French, I guess.  Marble everywhere, very clean and bright.  Kind of like a small French bistro.  You order you items at the front desk but the wait staff delivers your food.  You fill your own beverages.  No alcohol is served. 

The staff is extremely friendly and the crepes are delicious.  I had the turkey and swiss with béchamel sauce and it was heavenly.  And our side salad was fresh, light and tasty.  They serve sandwiches and Panini's too and I am sure they are equally delicious.  We had chocolate and coconut pastries and they were fabulous!  For an of you who enjoy this type of restaurant, you will be very pleased.
